source: TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_SEQ_00<tab>It is a cool and collected Sergeant Wiltswys who seeks an obliger today, rather than the heartsore fire-eater of the other day.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_SEQ_00<tab>キャンプ・スカルバレーのウィルトスィス甲曹長は、冒険者にある仕事を頼みたいようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_SEQ_01<tab>Wiltswys's meticulous scrutiny has discovered an unacceptable shortfall in the poison cabinet. Whilst she checks the other deadly yet life-saving items in the camp's inventory, you have a task to perform: stalk the majestic Rothlyt pelicans and extract three vials' worth of poison.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_SEQ_01<tab>ウィルトスィス甲曹長によると、砦の物資で不足している物があるらしい。「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2049D01 /var>」を討伐し「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E884A01 /var>」を集めよう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_SEQ_02<tab>Exactly <var 1A 02 /var>where<var 1A 01 /var> the poison is secreted is a matter too discomfiting to discuss. It must suffice to say that the pelicans did not survive your exertions. Return to Wiltswys and give her the pelican poison.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2049D01 /var>を討伐した。キャンプ・スカルバレーの「ウィルトスィス甲曹長」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E884A01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_SEQ_03<tab>It seems that the way to Sergeant Wiltswys's heart is through a job well done. Listening to her tale of the Sahagin and the lost settlement, you see that she has no home but this vale and no family but the Maelstrom─and she will fight to the death to defend both...
target: TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_SEQ_03<tab>ウィルトスィス甲曹長に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E884A01 /var>を渡した。この毒はサハギン族と戦う上で、とても重宝するらしい。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the vials of pelican poison to Wiltswys.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_TODO_01<tab>ウィルトスィス甲曹長に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E884A01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_WILTSWYS_000_000<tab>Weapons and armor...in order. Saltpeter, in order. Basic provisions...all in order. Poisons─oh? This vial's near gone.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_WILTSWYS_000_000<tab>武器甲冑よし……硝石と糧秣（りょうまつ）よし、っと。
あら？　薬品が不足してるわね……。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_WILTSWYS_000_001<tab>Uh, adventurer─<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, was it? Mayhap we can let bygones be bygones. You are skilled in wrangling beasts, I hear, and I have a need of pelican poison.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_WILTSWYS_000_001<tab>冒険者さん、ちょうどいいところに。
備品の「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E884A01 /var>」を補給したいのです。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_WILTSWYS_000_002<tab>The poison can be readily gathered from pelicans in the area, but I must continue my duties here. Are you so minded to undertake the task?
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_WILTSWYS_000_002<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E884A01 /var>」は、周辺に生息している、
「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2049D01 /var>」から入手できます。
お手数ですが、お願いできますか？
TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_DUMMY_000_010<tab>「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2049D01 /var>」を討伐し、コカトリスの毒を3個ゲット。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_WILTSWYS_000_020<tab>I welcome your return, adventurer. Have you what I asked for?
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_WILTSWYS_000_020<tab>冒険者さん、おかえりなさい。
お願いした品は集まりましたか？

source: TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_WILTSWYS_000_030<tab>Ah, I see you were not stinting in filling the vials! The last adventurer returned with each barely half-full and had the cheek to demand full payment. I have had a low opinion of adventurers since, but...
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_WILTSWYS_000_030<tab>……そうです、これこれ！
ありがとうございました。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_WILTSWYS_000_031<tab>You know of our past with the kobolds, but they are not the foe we fight today. Nay, all our guns are trained on the fishbacks.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_WILTSWYS_000_031<tab>現在、このキャンプ・スカルバレーは、
西のハーフストーン周辺に進出してきた、
サハギン族と交戦状態にあります。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_WILTSWYS_000_032<tab>Such a wee thing, this vial─but this too is a gun. So susceptible the Sahagin are to pelican poison that even the rawest recruit may, with a poison-tipped arrow, find herself a fisher of beastmen.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_WILTSWYS_000_032<tab>この<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E884A01 /var>は、サハギン族を殺傷するのに、
とても効果的な毒なんです。
鏃に塗れば、経験の浅い兵でも対等に戦うことができます。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_WILTSWYS_000_033<tab>There was a settlement here once, near Halfstone. Then the primal Leviathan rose, and the Sahagin invaded. Work of generations was undone in a season, and whole families perished.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_WILTSWYS_000_033<tab>ハーフストーン周辺には以前、入植地がありました。
それが、蛮神「リヴァイアサン」の活動で被害を受け、
サハギン族が攻め入ったことで滅亡してしまったのです。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_WILTSWYS_000_034<tab>I never knew the Halfstone settlement, but I believe it to be a home worth fighting for. And so we fight, with steel, fire, and even poison to reclaim that which is ours.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_WILTSWYS_000_034<tab>いつの日か、かの地を取り戻すために、
私たちは戦い続けているのですよ。
